name: 4momsMamaRoo
0:
”Alexa, turn on mamaRoo.”
”Alexa, turn off mamaRoo.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill is designed to add another means of controlling your 4moms mamaRoo multi-motion baby swing, model #1046, with simple voice commands such as
"Alexa, turn on mamaRoo." "Alexa, set mamaRoo motion to Kangaroo." "Alexa, set mamaRoo speed to three"

This skill is brought to you by 4moms and requires that the user have in their possession a 4moms mamaRoo multi-motion baby swing, model #1046. You can get more details about the 4moms mamaRoo multi-motion baby swing by visiting the 4moms website at https://www.4moms.com.

The skill requires account linking which can be accomplished using either the Alexa App or the 4moms mobile App for iOS or Android. The 4moms mobile App can be found in the appropriate App store for your particular device.
